%

\begin{abstract}
(a) Prove the following conjecture:

\: \; \textbf{
If $x$ is rational and $y$ is rational,
then $x+y$ is rational.
}
\noindent\textbf{\\}

\end{abstract}%

\bgroup
\color{abs}
\hrule
\egroup
